snippet.textDisplay: SegaRising yes the Mother series is the best in the world and ever! Earthbound will always be the best because it hasn't had countless remakes or sequels! That's what makes it special! And it's the only title that has three different installments and that's it! Every other game has sequel after sequel after prequel and on and on. But I don't see another mother game being made. So yes Earthbound is the best game EVER!!
snippet.textOriginal: SegaRising yes the Mother series is the best in the world and ever! Earthbound will always be the best because it hasn't had countless remakes or sequels! That's what makes it special! And it's the only title that has three different installments and that's it! Every other game has sequel after sequel after prequel and on and on. But I don't see another mother game being made. So yes Earthbound is the best game EVER!!

snippet.textDisplay: @EraserPill Earthbound isn't hard to find, its just extremely over priced because the hyper die hard fans (Starmen.net) will pay anything for the game. Which drives the price up for average joe collectors like myself. Luckily I found a guy in my local area on craigslist who I bought a copy of the game from for 50$. So your guarentee is not that logical. Maybe online yes. But finding a game "in the wild" can have any sort of outcome. And while i do have HB Channel on my wii, i like collecting
snippet.textOriginal: @EraserPill Earthbound isn't hard to find, its just extremely over priced because the hyper die hard fans (Starmen.net) will pay anything for the game. snippet.textDisplay:
@SegaRising I love mother 3 to death too=P but imo I don't think it tops this game. This game had a greater scope of freedom, more towns and just another sensation to it. The storytelling was much more traditional in m3, while m2 it was very quirky, yet veery engaging. But dang both of the games are amazing...as for mother 1..... I've never beaten that  game it's too hard lol  
of course I'm not stating it IS the best game of the two..It's just a personal favourite for me^^
snippet.textOriginal:
@SegaRising I love mother 3 to death too=P but imo I don't think it tops this game. This game had a greater scope of freedom, more towns and just another sensation to it. The storytelling was much more traditional in m3, while m2 it was very quirky, yet veery engaging. But dang both of the games are amazing...as for mother 1..... I've never beaten that  game it's too hard lol  
of course I'm not stating it IS the best game of the two..It's just a personal favourite for me^^

snippet.textDisplay: I figured I'd upload the town themes in order: Onett, Twoson then Threed. Threed was especially memorable when it was haunted, I always thought the dark atmosphere during that time was awesome, and kind of scary as a kid.
snippet.textOriginal: I figured I'd upload the town themes in order: Onett, Twoson then Threed. Threed was especially memorable when it was haunted, I always thought the dark atmosphere during that time was awesome, and kind of scary as a kid.
